name: Planet Visit
description:
According to the laws of the galaxy that applies to middle-sized scout ships (like yours!), you can only spend 35 seconds on each foreign planet. WHAT?? Don't look at me, I didn't write the rules!

Mine and plant, then craft and sell. The alien merchants are the only way to get your hands on the expensive fuel. Make sure you never run out of it! Your home is just 12 random planets away.

Made for JamCraft 5 (themes: Alien, Expire). Made alone in 10 days.

The music is from this free pack.
